name: Garbage Runner
description:
Ever feel like trash? Want a game to make you feel better? Garbage Runner allows you to take the role of a disgruntled garbage worker who is fed up with their job. Instead of collecting trash, you must run over all trash, while avoiding pesky obstacles like children and old men. Feel the pure exhilaration of speed and freedom as you plow through people's trash cans.  

Garbage Runner is a work of fiction, do not recreate at home.

Created by:
